basics.name: K. Sanjay
basics.label: Associate
basics.summary: To pursue a challenging career, responsible for being associated with a progressive organization and by keeping up with the latest trends and applying knowledge and work dynamically towards the growth of the organization.

work.name: Unspecified Company
work.position: Store manager, CPA manager, Admin. Executive, Manager - Customer
work.summary: Worked in various roles at multiple companies, involved in maintaining stock, team handling, planning, purchasing, credit operations, preparing loan agreements, administrative tasks, preparing PO and sales invoices, creating payment ledgers, and preparing MIS.

volunteer.summary: Volunteer for Lions Club. Also a blood donor at Apollo Hospital.

education.institution: Annamalai University, Madras University, I.C.F Silver Jubilee Matriculation School
education.area: Human Resources, Business Administration, Computer Technology, Labour Law & Administrative Law

awards.title: All India Inter University Gold medalist
awards.summary: Twice awarded the All India Inter University Gold medalist.
